name: Corrosive Caverns II (Spring Spring)
description:
I lack the words to describe this game at the moment, a better description will be coming soon. You basically just fly around and shoot stuff in an absurd dreamworld.

Perhaps a more fitting name for this game is Corrosive Caverns 2.0, since its really just a remake of an earlier game, not a real sequel. It was originally created for the OGA Spring Game Jam 2021.

The cover art was made by Sinnocturnal.
